title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is expected that the item would disappear. However, in the new PDF emitter, this behavior is not being achieved.
OB: In the new PDF emitter, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item does not disappear as expected.
EB: Expected behavior: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should disappear when previewed in PDF format. Actual behavior: The item is still visible in the PDF preview.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Observe that the item is still visible in the PDF preview.
